item.title: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
item.description: I’ve made a start on Brian Harveyâ€™s Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs lectures - based on the book with the same name. I’m about 7 lectures in and I’m enjoying it so far. My only gripe is that the videos look like they were filmed in the 1980s - when they are actually from 2011.
